sentences.en: All his actions are governed by expediency.
sentences.cn: 他所有的行动都是一种权宜之计.

sentences.en: But when we rejoice about it's expediency, the network security come closely.
sentences.cn: 然而就在人们为之欣喜的同时, 网络安全问题接踵而至.

sentences.en: For me integrity, not expediency, and deeply rooted in the values of the intrinsic business requirements.
sentences.cn: 诚信对于我, 不是权宜之计, 而深深植根于企业的价值观的内在要求.

sentences.en: He acted from expediency, not from principle.
sentences.cn: 他为求达到目的, 丧失了原则.

sentences.en: Human expediency and lusts go beyond limits and are willfully in the light of day.
sentences.cn: 私利欲望贪得无厌随时轻松越过自家后院的藩篱在光天化日之下恣意妄为.

sentences.en: It has excellence of simple institution , expediency for use, high weaving efficiency and good quality.
sentences.cn: 其机构简单, 使用方便, 编织效率高,产品品质好.

sentences.en: It was difficult to strike the right balance between justice and expediency.
sentences.cn: 在公正与私利之间很难两全.

sentences.en: Others see it as the triumph of expediency over principle.
sentences.cn: 其他人视其为权宜对于原则的胜利.

sentences.en: Take a firm stand against putting expediency above principle; bluff ahead of facts.
sentences.cn: 坚持不让权宜之计取代固有原则, 不让浮夸掩盖事实.

sentences.en: The above method is a practical expediency.
sentences.cn: 上面的方法实际是一种权宜之计.
政治上权宜之举的伦理问题

sentences.en: There will always be tensions between principle and expediency.
sentences.cn: 原则和权宜之计之间总是矛盾重重.

sentences.en: This was a matter less of morals than of expediency.
sentences.cn: 此举只是权宜之计，不关乎道德问题。

sentences.en: Your expediency and cooperation are greatly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 您的权宜与合作是极大的赞赏.

trans.tran_en: Expediency means doing what is convenient rather than what is morally right
